core:processNote.core:description:
Copy across orginal tender card details to the new CardTenderItem.
In the process, we convert ICC Refunds to sImple Swiped refunds, as is usually done in normal CardRefund process.
Set Cardholder Not Present regardless of input.

core:state.core:comment: Issue change if required. TODO - determine if change is actually needed before starting change process?

If tenderId is specified on the input, we load this tender and use it to check basic restrictions. This check is not accurate if we later allow the captured card to set the actual tender used to something else (which we do).
